mapper.select: select s.id, s.discount, s.discount_price, s.img, s.info, s.name, s.price, s.selling_price, s.stat, s.stock_num, s.store, s.category_id, s.sales_volume, s.visit_volume, s.intro, s.tags from t_category c left join t_shop s on c.id = s.category_id where c.id = #{categoryId}

select s.id, s.discount, s.discount_price, s.img, s.info, s.name, s.price, s.selling_price, s.stat, s.stock_num, s.store, s.category_id, s.sales_volume, s.visit_volume, s.intro, s.tags from t_shop s where s.id = #{id}

select s.id, s.discount, s.discount_price, s.img, s.info, s.name, s.price, s.selling_price, s.stat, s.stock_num, s.store, s.category_id, s.sales_volume, s.visit_volume, s.intro, s.tags from t_shop s where s.name like concat('%', #{shopName}, '%')

select s.id, s.discount, s.discount_price, s.img, s.info, s.name, s.price, s.selling_price, s.stat, s.stock_num, s.store, s.category_id, s.sales_volume, s.visit_volume, s.intro, s.tags from t_shop s where s.discount = #{discount} order by s.sales_volume desc

select s.id, s.discount, s.discount_price, s.img, s.info, s.name, s.price, s.selling_price, s.stat, s.stock_num, s.store, s.category_id, s.sales_volume, s.visit_volume, s.intro, s.tags from t_shop s order by s.visit_volume desc limit 12
mapper.update: update t_shop set visit_volume = #{visitVolume} where id = #{shopId}
